named-query.name: providerPrefs.find
named-query.query: SELECT providerPrefs FROM ProviderPrefs providerPrefs WHERE providerPrefs.providerDuz = :providerDuz AND providerPrefs.facilityNo = :facilityNo AND providerPrefs.active = 1

named-query.name: clinicPrefs.find
named-query.query: SELECT clinicPrefs FROM ClinicPrefs clinicPrefs WHERE clinicPrefs.clinicIen = :clinicIen AND clinicPrefs.facilityNo = :facilityNo AND clinicPrefs.active = 1

named-query.name: facilityPrefs.find
named-query.query: SELECT facilityPrefs FROM FacilityPrefs facilityPrefs WHERE facilityPrefs.facilityNo = :facilityNo AND facilityPrefs.active = 1

named-query.name: userSettings.find
named-query.query: SELECT userSettings FROM UserSettings userSettings WHERE userSettings.facilityNo = :facilityNo AND userSettings.userDuz = :userDuz AND userSettings.active = 1

named-query.name: strings.findByStation
named-query.query: SELECT stringResource FROM StringResource stringResource WHERE stringResource.stationNo = :stationNo OR stringResource.stationNo = null AND stringResource.language.abbreviation = :language AND stringResource.active = 1

named-query.name: strings.findByName
named-query.query: SELECT stringResource FROM StringResource stringResource WHERE stringResource.stationNo = :stationNo AND stringResource.name = :name AND stringResource.language.abbreviation = :language AND stringResource.active = 1

named-query.name: language.findByAbbr
named-query.query: SELECT language FROM Language language WHERE language.abbreviation = :abbreviation AND abbreviation.active = 1

named-query.name: translations.find.bySource
named-query.query: SELECT translation FROM Translation translation WHERE translation.facilityNo = :facilityNo AND translation.source = :source AND (translation.language.id IS NULL OR translation.language.id = :languageId) AND translation.active = 1

named-query.name: translations.find.byId
named-query.query: SELECT translation FROM Translation translation WHERE translation.facilityNo = :facilityNo AND translation.id = :id AND translation.active = 1

named-query.name: services.find.byName
named-query.query: SELECT service FROM Service service WHERE service.facilityNo = :facilityNo AND service.name = :name AND service.active = 1

named-query.name: services.find.byId
named-query.query: SELECT service FROM Service service WHERE service.facilityNo = :facilityNo AND service.id = :id AND service.active = 1

named-query.name: encounterCache.find
named-query.query: SELECT encounterCache FROM EncounterCache encounterCache WHERE encounterCache.facilityNo = :facilityNo AND encounterCache.patientDfn = :patientDfn AND encounterCache.locationIen = :locationIen AND encounterCache.encounterDatetime = :datetime AND encounterCache.active = 1

named-query.name: encounterCache.findByDates
named-query.query: SELECT encounterCache FROM EncounterCache encounterCache WHERE encounterCache.facilityNo LIKE :facilityNo AND encounterCache.dateCreated >= :startDate AND encounterCache.dateCreated <= :endDate AND encounterCache.active = 1

named-query.name: healthfactors.find
named-query.query: SELECT healthFactor FROM FacilityHealthFactor healthFactor WHERE healthFactor.stationNo = :stationNo AND healthFactor.active = 1

named-query.name: healthfactors.findByType
named-query.query: SELECT healthFactor FROM FacilityHealthFactor healthFactor WHERE healthFactor.stationNo = :stationNo AND healthFactor.type = :type AND healthFactor.active = 1

named-query.name: sites.findByStation
named-query.query: from VhaSite site where site.stationNo=:stationNo

named-query.name: sites.findByStationAndProtocol
named-query.query: from VhaSite site where site.stationNo=:stationNo AND site.protocol=:protocol

named-query.name: pvs.findClinicsByStationNo
named-query.query: SELECT pvsClinic FROM PvsClinic pvsClinic WHERE pvsClinic.stationNo = :stationNo AND pvsClinic.active = 1

named-query.name: pvs.findByDateClinic
named-query.query: SELECT pvsPrintLog FROM PvsPrintLog pvsPrintLog WHERE pvsPrintLog.clinic.id = :clinicId AND pvsPrintLog.dateCreated = :date AND pvsPrintLog.active = 1

named-query.name: pvs.findClinicalRemindersByStationNo
named-query.query: SELECT pvsClinicalReminder FROM PvsClinicalReminder pvsClinicalReminder WHERE pvsClinicalReminder.stationNo = :stationNo AND pvsClinicalReminder.active = 1
